description:
To reinstall exterior metal stairs leading from the raised ground
>floor to the garden, for which we have sole use.  The previous
>leaseholder removed the steps as they were unsafe.  There is a door
>leading out to where the steps were previously which has been poorly
>secured and we are keen to reinstall these steps as a matter of urgency
>as we have a three year old child.  The steps we propose to install are
>in line with similar steps of the adjacent houses.  They will not
>overlook or disrupt the enjoyment or use of adjacent properties.
>
>2.  To the front of the house there is an area under the from entrance
>steps which was an old coal storage area. we intend to convert this to a
>utility room.  We intend to install a small window which will look onto
>our front garden.  There is no intrusion of privacy  into any of our
>neigbours property with the installation of this window.  I understand
>that a similar project has been undertaken a few doors away.
>
